message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity that could significantly benefit your business. We're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope we can discuss further how this product can meet your needs and potentially exceed your expectations.

Alice, thanks for the offer, but $950,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product, reflecting its value to me. I believe this is a fair price that benefits both of us. Let's see if we can make this work.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to engage in this discussion. After considering your offer, I am prepared to negotiate further. In light of the value you see in our product, I would like to propose a price of $900,000. This reflects a compromise between our initial offers and could be beneficial for both parties involved.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $900,000 is closer, it's still a bit higher than I'm able to go.  I'm willing to offer $875,000. This is a solid price that reflects the value of the product to me and allows for a mutually beneficial deal.  I'm confident we can reach an agreement at this price.

I understand your position, Bob, and I'm glad we're finding common ground here. After reviewing our costs and potential margins, I believe we can agree on a price of $890,000 for the product. This figure strikes a balance between our interests and ensures a satisfactory transaction for both parties. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and allows us to move forward together.
